General.Name: GTS Internasional Tbk PT
General.Description: PT GTS Internasional Tbk engages in the sea transportation and other related activities. It operates through three segments: Liquefied Natural Gas (LNG) Transportation Services, LNG Storage and Regasification, and Ship Management Services. The company transports LNG; and provides ship management services, such as preparation, monitoring, and recording ship operation plans; preparation, monitoring, reporting, and finalizing ship budgets; monitoring and implementing the plan maintenance program and ship docking schedule; providing training and education to the ship crew; and preparation, monitoring, and reporting obligation on tax and financial audits. It also engages in the liquefied gas processing services. The company was founded in 2012 and is headquartered in Jakarta, Indonesia. PT GTS Internasional Tbk operates as a subsidiary of PT Humpuss Maritim Internasional.
General.Address: Mangkuluhur City Tower One, Jakarta, Indonesia, 12930
